column4: Hi I have a little question that might sound silly. My friend is using GNOME and he says his default file manager is VLC, somehow. Apparently to change the default file manager is in a different place than the usual open with/default application place. Any insight?
KM0202: yes, it opens the place in the VLC playlist browser
do you mean VLC is media file manager for music and video ?, a file manager is used for most files on the system
